Uses of Class
gui.view.Matchfield

Packages that use Matchfield
Package Description
gameboard.tiles
this package deals with the single tiles and their properties / functionalities on the gameboard
gui.controller
This package contains the controller classes like SceneController and MovingObjectController.
gui.view
This package contains the classes that implement the stage and the different scenes and panes.
simulator
This package contains the classes to start and store the main information of the game.

  • Uses of Matchfield in gameboard.tiles

    Methods in gameboard.tiles with parameters of type Matchfield
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void FieldTile.cultivateField​(Matchfield matchfield, int column, int row, int field, InformationBox informationBox)
    This method cultivates the fields.
    void FieldTile.harvestField​(Matchfield matchfield, int column, int row, int field, InformationBox informationBox, Harvester harvester)
    This method harvests the fields.
    void FieldTile.sowField​(Matchfield matchfield, int column, int row, int field, InformationBox informationBox)
    This method sows the fields.

    private Matchfield MovingObjectController.MATCHFIELD

    the actual Matchfield object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game

  • Uses of Matchfield in simulator

    Methods in simulator with parameters of type Matchfield
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void Game.fillMatchfieldWithFields​(FieldTile fieldTile, Matchfield matchfield)
    This method uses the fillWithField() methods from the class Matchfield to implement the tiles of a field that have been processed before saving the game.
